verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> we are your <S%H6106>bone<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

<S%H1571>Also<s%> in <S%H865>time<s%> <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032>past,<s%> when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us, you <S%H1961>were<s%> he that <S%H3318>led<s%> out and <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to you, You shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and you shall be a <S%H5057>captain<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>league<s%> with them in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and they <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

In <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H2320>months:<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land:<s%> which <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>Except<s%> <S%H518><s%> you <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame,<s%> you shall not <S%H935>come<s%> in here: <S%H559>thinking,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> in here.
Nevertheless <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H4686>strong<s%> <S%H4686>hold<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> Whoever <S%H5060>gets<s%> up to the <S%H6794>gutter,<s%> and <S%H5221>smites<s%> the <S%H2983>Jebusites,<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame<s%> and the blind <S%H5787><s%>that are <S%H8130>hated<s%> of <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H5315>soul,<s%> he shall be chief and captain. <S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H5787>blind<s%> and the <S%H6455>lame<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H4686>fort,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about from <S%H4407>Millo<s%> and <S%H1004>inward.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> on, and grew <S%H1419>great,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> was with him.

And <S%H2438>Hiram<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> and <S%H2796>carpenters,<s%> <S%H6086><s%> and <S%H2796>masons:<s%> <S%H68><s%> and they <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> an <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H3559>established<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and that he had <S%H5375>exalted<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> for his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel's<s%> <S%H5668>sake.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H6370>concubines<s%> and <S%H802>wives<s%> out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he was <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H2275>Hebron:<s%> and there were <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> be the <S%H8034>names<s%> of those that were <S%H3209>born<s%> to him in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H8051>Shammuah,<s%> and <S%H7727>Shobab,<s%> and <S%H5416>Nathan,<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%>
<S%H2984>Ibhar<s%> also, and <S%H474>Elishua,<s%> and <S%H5298>Nepheg,<s%> and <S%H3309>Japhia,<s%>
And <S%H476>Elishama,<s%> and <S%H450>Eliada,<s%> and <S%H467>Eliphalet.<s%>

But when the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they had <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it, and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H4686>hold.<s%>
The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> also <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Shall I <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H6430>Philistines?<s%> will you <S%H5414>deliver<s%> them into my <S%H3027>hand?<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H5927>Go<s%> up: for I will doubtless <S%H5414>deliver<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1188>Baalperazim,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> them <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6555>broken<s%> forth on my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, as the <S%H6556>breach<s%> of <S%H4325>waters.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1188>Baalperazim.<s%>
And <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H6091>images,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H5375>burned<s%> them.
And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3254>again,<s%> and <S%H5203>spread<s%> themselves in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim.<s%>

And when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> You shall not <S%H5927>go<s%> up; but fetch a <S%H5437>compass<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them, and <S%H935>come<s%> on them <S%H4136>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H1057>mulberry<s%> trees.

And let it be, when you <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H6807>going<s%> in the <S%H7218>tops<s%> of the <S%H1057>mulberry<s%> trees, that <S%H227>then<s%> you shall <S%H2782>bestir<s%> yourself: for <S%H227>then<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> you, to <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him; and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1507>Gazer.<s%>
